name: BasicMathTraining
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basic math training
des: It is an interactive algebra training game. It randomly generates addition,subtraction, multiplication or division questions and ask users to give the answer. The maximum factor number involved in addition and subtraction is 99. And the maximum factor number involved in multiplication and division is 20. It is aimed for primary school algebra training.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
